mapper.insert: insert into WarehouseOut (id, orderId, goodsId, qty, createTime, status,infoid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update WarehouseOut set orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infoid = #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, orderId, goodsId, qty, createTime, status, infoid from WarehouseOut
